alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:40AM CDT until July 21 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BENTON...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 740 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Colcord to 2 miles north of West Siloam Springs to 4 miles southwest of Watts, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Gentry... Decatur... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... Watts... Springtown... Cincinnati... Lake Francis... Fairmount... Ballard... Wedington... Gallitin... Rhea... Rocky Comfort... Cherokee City... Natural Falls State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
